participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and creative, Emily loves to explore new ideas and share her passion with others.
participant_1.background: I'm excited to drive my new car in any weather! I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs. I'm a writer who enjoys spending time with my dog. I love playing guitar but sometimes I spend too much time practicing and not enough time with my family. I run every morning before work to clear my head and relieve stress.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Reflective and caring, Jake values connection with others and often seeks to uplift those around him.
participant_2.background: I used to wear a lot of black because it was easy to put together outfits. I've been in my fair share of fights, but I'm not proud of it. I love my music and playing guitar is my favorite way to relax after a long day. I drive only Toyota. I usually spend my free time helping people in need.

content.text: What's the best thing about your morning routine?
I love that I have time to practice my guitar before work.  I love making music.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all sorts of music, but I'm really into blues and rock right now.
I love blues too! What's your favorite blues song?
I love "Sweet Home Chicago" by Robert Johnson.  It's such a classic.
That's a great song! I love the guitar solo in it.
Me too! It's so simple, but so effective.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a social worker.  I help people in need.
That's great!  I'm sure you make a big difference in people's lives.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, play guitar, and hang out with my friends and family.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies!
Yeah, I do!  I'm a pretty lucky guy
